abstract: Retirees are spending their free time learning everything from managing a mouse to mastering Microsoft Excel.
snippet: Retirees are spending their free time learning everything from managing a mouse to mastering Microsoft Excel.
lead_paragraph: AT age 83, Irma Morris doesn’t exactly fit the description of a typical student. A resident of San Jose, Calif., she has seven grandchildren. Before her retirement in 1982, she worked nearly 40 years in the cartography industry.

headline.main: Out of the Work Force and Into a Classroom
headline.print_headline: Out of the Work Force And Into a Classroom

abstract: European regulators hailed the deal as a breakthrough that should create more competition, especially for server software that powers corporate data centers and the Internet.
snippet: European regulators hailed the deal as a breakthrough that should create more competition, especially for server software that powers corporate data centers and the Internet.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft has given up its nine-year fight against antitrust regulators in Europe, saying yesterday that it would not challenge a court judgment from last month and would share technical information with rivals on terms the software giant had long resisted.

headline.main: Microsoft Is Yielding in European Antitrust Fight

byline.original: By Steve Lohr and Kevin J. O'Brien

abstract: With a market value of $162 billion, Apple is now the most valuable computer maker in the world, and it is the fourth most valuable technology company, after Microsoft, Google and Cisco. It will have to battle all of them to stay on top of the tech world.
snippet: With a market value of $162 billion, Apple is now the most valuable computer maker in the world, and it is the fourth most valuable technology company, after Microsoft, Google and Cisco. It will have to battle all of them to stay on top of the tec...
lead_paragraph: It’s official. Apple is the most valuable computer maker in the world.

headline.main: How Apple Can Keep Its Value
